DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial explore effect self-positioning cognitive performance work environment use standardize cognitive test battery evaluate executive function two condition : sit standing .
DOC.brief_title: Are You Sitting Down : Cognitive Exectutive Function Task Comparison Between Seated Standing Positions
DOC.detailed_description: The aim trial explore effect self-positioning cognitive performance work environment use standardize cognitive test battery evaluate executive function two condition : sit stand . Methods : This counterbalance controlled trial involve 17 men ( mean age +/-SD : 29.8 +/- 5.5 ) science background graduate degree . The participant accustom work open environment none currently use stand desk . We use modify version CNS Vital Signs ( CNSVS ) test battery assess cognitive executive function ( CEF ) two typical work position - standing seat . Participants randomly assign stand seat position begin test procedure . Upon completion first test round instruct rest 10 min . dark room distraction commence second round test position alternate fashion . The main outcome measure CNSVS score six CEF domain two different work position
DOC.criteria: male computer savvy advance education degree ADD medication currently person use stand desk
